record.creatorPhotographer: Cory, Virgil; Trans-World Airlines News Bureau
record.description: Airhostess Alice Brekke shows University of Chicago co-ed applicants for TWA hostess positions how to prepare and serve a seven-course meal aboard one of the airline's twenty-one passenger transports. Left to right, Harriett Fawcett, Miss Brekke, Marjorie Hibbard, and Mary Jane Geisert.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
